titles.title: Father, to Thee a joyful song we raise

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: How deep the holy joy that fills that scene, Where love is known! Thy love, our God and Father, now is seen, In Him alone; As, in the holy calm of Thine own rest, He leads the praise of those Thy love has blessed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He leads the praise! How precious to Thine ear The song He sings! How precious, too, to Thee—how near, how dear Are those He brings To share His place: ’twas thus that Thou didst plan; Thou lovedst Him before the world began.
